wishText: On this special day, I want to let you know how much you mean to me.
You're not just my little sister, but you're also my best friend. â¤ï¸
I can't believe how quickly time has flown by. It feels like just yesterday you were born, and now you're turning 13! ğŸŒŸ
You've grown into such a beautiful, smart,pretty, and kind-hearted young lady. Watching you grow up has been one of the greatest joys of my life. ğŸ’–
As you enter your teenage years, I want you to know that I'll always be here for you. Whether you need someone to talk to, someone to vent to, or just someone to laugh with, I'll be here. ğŸ¤—
So on this special day, I hope you have an amazing birthday filled with love, laughter, and lots of cake! ğŸ‚ğŸ‰ğŸ
Love you to the moon and back, NjeriiğŸŒ™ğŸ’•
